_meanings:
{@--3@} A 
secondary word of a sentence, a preposition,
particle &c. prefixed to a verb or
a noun derived from a verb which
determines or qualifies the sense
of the verb; {#upapadamatiN#}

{#AkarRalaMbin#} &c.
